title: 209: Your Core Desired Feelings with Danielle LaPorte
itunes:title: 209: Your Core Desired Feelings with Danielle LaPorte
description:
What if you planned your life around how you wanted to feel? Magic would ensue. In this episode, we discuss why your core desired feelings are your ultimate roadmap in life. I discuss emotions, intentions and manifestations with renown writer Danielle LaPorte, who inspires me deeply.

Check out her work at DanielleLaporte.com
